To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private EveningDojiStar _eveningdojistar;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_eveningdojistar = EveningDojiStar(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_eveningdojistar.IsReady)
{
    var period = _eveningdojistar.Period.Value;
    var current = _eveningdojistar.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.eveningdojistar = self.EveningDojiStar(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.eveningdojistar.IsReady:
    period = self.eveningdojistar.Period.Value
    current = self.eveningdojistar.Current.Value
